description: Minimal Calendar Widget A Minimal Calendar Widget that's always on current date's month. Features: * Contains no ads or payments * Always on current date’s month * 3x2 (resizable) * Displays all events from your calendars with a symbol set (high number becomes generic) * Native widget configuration access or press widget’s top right corner * Pressing on any other part of the widget opens calendar application * Configurable: start day of the week, calendar (gregorian or holocene), show declined events, focus on current week, open calendar on clicked day, theme, symbol set, symbol set colour, transparency, text size
